select ri.id, ri.code, ri.name, ri.file_url, ri.create_date, ri.student_id, ei.name as expertName, ei.images as expertImages from resume_info ri left join expert_info ei on (ei.id = ri.student_id) where 1 = 1
AND ri.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{resumeInfo.name},'%')
AND ei.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{resumeInfo.expertName},'%')
AND ei.user_id = #{resumeInfo.expertId}
order by ri.create_date desc
